title: Wood Retail Display (Wine Barrel Not Included)
item_description:
Wood Retail Display (Wine Barrel Not Included)

  • Width: 41”
  • Length: 34”
  • Height: 78”
  • Buyer Responsibilities: The buyer of this lot is responsible for all aspects of disassembly and removal. The buyer of this lot is responsible to bring all necessary tools and manpower for the disassembly and removal of this lot. This lot will not be disassembled by West Auctions and no assistance will be provided by West Auctions.

Removal Note: Buyers are fully responsible for all aspects of removal of this lot. That includes electrical and plumbing disconnection if applicable. No loading assistance or other removal assistance of any kind is provided by West Auctions. Please bid accordingly.
